name: source-product
description: Bustly AliExpress product sourcing skill for OpenClaw - image search, text search, and product discovery

scripts.get:accounts: tsx -e 'import { getAliExpressAccounts } from "./lib/aliexpress_api.ts"; getAliExpressAccounts().then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2))).catch(e => console.error(e))'
scripts.test:token: tsx -e 'import { testAccessToken } from "./lib/aliexpress_api.ts"; testAccessToken().then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2))).catch(e => console.error(e))'
